channel.title: Firemaking my way i need help with method
channel.description:
} else if ((itemUsed == 1511 && useWith == 590) || (itemUsed == 590 && useWith == 1511)) { if (playerLevel[11] >= 1) { deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); ObjectHandler.addObject(744, absX, absY, 1, playerId, false); setAnimation(733); addSkillXP(500, 11); } else { sendMessage( "You need a level 1 firemaking to fire this :)"); }
okay wat i wanna do is making firemaking with item use on etc but look at the object handler i want it to drop a fire when i make a fire now look
ItemHandler.addItem(744, absX, absY, 1, playerId, false);
this works! it drops a crystal on floor can some1 help me and declare the method for objecthandler addobject? thanks! ill gve some rep for that :)
